several pains experienced by a patient. For these reasons, opioids are used 
more frequently in patients with cancer-related neuropathic pain. Standard 
guidelines for the use of anticonvulsants (e.g. pregabalin and gabapentin), ...
title: Neuropathic pain in cancer - Science Direct
